summary: Challenge the people of Skyrim to a drinking contest. Why should Sanguine get to have all the fun?
descriptionHtml:
Drinking Contest:

[IMG]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/37443-2-1371810969.jpg[/IMG]

Now you can approach anyone in Skyrim (except for kds) for a drinking contest. Who ever wins gets 300 gold. Why should Sanguine get to have all the fun?

If you win the contest:
The NPC will give you 300 gold and walk like they are drunk.

[IMG]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/37443-3-1371810969.jpg[/IMG]

if the NPC wins the contest:
You black out and give the NPC 300 gold.

Plain and simple.

This mod requires the newest Skyrim update.

To use this mod:
Extract contents of the zip file into Skyrim\'s data folder.

I hope you enjoy my mod. Have fun!
author: MimiTheAlchemist
